vendor_name: ANA Crowne Plaza Kumamoto New Sky
title: Contemporary Japan Waterfront Hotel near Kumamoto Castle
description: On the banks of the Shirakawa River, ANA Crowne Plaza Hotel Kumamoto New Sky, an IHG Hotel towers over the city, showcasing sweeping skyline views. Savour sophisticated dining options at the onsite restaurants, visit the striking Kumamoto Castle for an insight into the history of Japan or take a soothing stroll through the gardens of Suizenji Park. Return to the hotel for a good night's sleep or spend the evening in quiet contemplation enjoying the neon vistas of Kumamoto.
location_description: ANA Crowne Plaza Kumamoto New Sky, an IHG Hotel
